titleStmt.title: A letter from the Heer Lieutenant-Admiral De Ruyter to the States-General of the United-Provinces; giving an account of the late engagement between him, and the French fleet, on the coast of Sicily. Translated out of Dutch, as it was printed at the Hague.
titleStmt.author: Ruyter, Michiel Adriaanszoon de, 1607-1676.

titleStmt.title: A letter from the Heer Lieutenant-Admiral De Ruyter to the States-General of the United-Provinces; giving an account of the late engagement between him, and the French fleet, on the coast of Sicily. Translated out of Dutch, as it was printed at the Hague.
titleStmt.author: Ruyter, Michiel Adriaanszoon de, 1607-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy, printed by Tho. Newcomb,

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 8: Michiel Ad. Ruyter.

Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
